attributes.action: Stop the BBC from making Catherine Tate the next assistant for Doctor Who
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last Christmas special of Doctor Who was rubbish as Catherine Tate was neither funny or any good at acting. Please help prevent Doctor Who from jumping the shark (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jumping_the_shark) by stopping this from happening.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
